interpretation: The "ring buoy" card represents a time of emotional upheaval or danger. You may feel like you are drowning in your emotions and need a lifeline to hold on to. This card may also indicate a need for external support, whether that be from friends, family, or a professional. The ring buoy is a symbol of hope and rescue, reminding you that even in the darkest of times, there is always a way to stay afloat. Trust in the support and guidance of others to help you navigate these turbulent waters. Keywords associated with this card include rescue, support, hope, emotional upheaval, and danger.
